# connections

**Instance Property**

The connections between inputs and outputs that a capture session contains.

## Declaration

```swift
var connections: [AVCaptureConnection] { get }
```

## Discussion

A capture session automatically forms connections between inputs and outputs when you call the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/addInput(_:)] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/addOutput(_:)] methods. You can explicitly add connections to a session by calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/addConnection(_:)] method.

## Connecting inputs and outputs

- **addConnection(_:)**: Adds a connection to the capture session.
- **canAddConnection(_:)**: Determines whether a you can add a connection to a capture session.
- **addInputWithNoConnections(_:)**: Adds a capture input to a session without forming any connections.
- **addOutputWithNoConnections(_:)**: Adds a capture output to the session without forming any connections.
- **removeConnection(_:)**: Removes a capture connection from the session.
- **AVCaptureAudioChannel**: An object that monitors average and peak power levels for an audio channel in a capture connection.
